---
title: "AFLW Player Data"
---

```{r}
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
library(bslib)

source("https://github.com/bit-in-that/data-automation/raw/main/aflw_fantasy/modules/get_player_data_afw.R")
player_data <- get_player_data()


```


```{=html}
<script>
const x = ['a', 1, ['d']];
download_table = function() {
  Reactable.downloadDataCSV('player-data')
}

func = function() {
  console.log(get_x());
}

get_x = function() {
  return x;
}


</script>
```



```{r}

player_data |> 
  select(id, full_name, birthday, squad_name, position, gamesPlayed, avgPoints) |> 
  reactable(
    elementId = "player-data"
  )


htmltools::browsable(
  tagList(
    tags$button("Download as CSV", onclick = "download_table()"),
    tags$button("Funky", onclick = "func()"),
    tags$button("Hide Species", onclick = "Reactable.setHiddenColumns('iris-table', ['Species'])"),
    tags$button("Show All", onclick = "Reactable.setHiddenColumns('iris-table', [])"),
    reactable(
      iris,
      columns = list(
        Sepal.Length = colDef(show = FALSE),
        Sepal.Width = colDef()
      ),
      defaultPageSize = 5,
      elementId = "iris-table",
      columnGroups = list(colGroup(
        "Group", columns = c("Sepal.Length", "Sepal.Width", "Species")
      ))
    )
  )
)
```
